toys.name: Shimmering Fancy Jewellery Sets
toys.title: Marvel Legends Avengers Endgame Thor Action Figure
toys.alt: Marvel Legends Avengers Endgame Thor Action Figure
toys.description: This Marvel Legends Avengers Endgame Thor Action Figure is the perfect addition to any fan's collection. The figure is highly detailed and features a variety of points of articulation, allowing you to pose him in a variety of ways. He also comes with a number of accessories, including his hammer, Mjolnir, and his axe, Stormbreaker.
toys.review: This is a great action figure! It's well-made and has a lot of detail. I'm very happy with my purchase.

toys.name: Modern Earing and Studs
toys.title: DC Comics Justice League Batman Action Figure
toys.alt: DC Comics Justice League Batman Action Figure
toys.description: This DC Comics Justice League Batman Action Figure is the perfect addition to any fan's collection. The figure is highly detailed and features a variety of points of articulation, allowing you to pose him in a variety of ways. He also comes with a number of accessories, including his batarangs and his grapple gun.
toys.review: This is an amazing action figure! It's even better than I expected. The detail is incredible and the articulation is great. I'm so glad I bought it.

toys.name: Bracelets & Bangles
toys.title: Giant Teddy Bear
toys.description: This Giant Teddy Bear is the perfect gift for any occasion. It's soft, cuddly, and sure to bring a smile to anyone's face. The bear is made from high-quality materials and is built to last.
toys.review: This teddy bear is amazing! It's so soft and cuddly. I love it so much!
